scripts.build:all: npm run build:android && npm run build:docs && npm run build:docs2 && npm run build:csharp && npm run build:php
scripts.build:android: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g android -o dist/android/ --package-name agb.lib --model-package models --api-package api
scripts.build:docs: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g html2 -o dist/docs/ --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api && gulp docs
scripts.build:docs2: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g html -o dist/docs2/ --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api && gulp docs2
scripts.build:csharp: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g csharp -o dist/csharp/ --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api
scripts.build:php: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g php -o dist/php/  --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api && gulp php
scripts.build:swift: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g swift4 -o dist/swift4/  --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api
scripts.build:axios: npm run prebuild && openapi-generator generate -i openapi.yaml -g typescript-axios -o dist/axios --package-name AGB.Lib --model-package Models --api-package Api && tsc
